ratings.question_text: The readings/cases/textbooks used in this course were __________ .
Out-of-class assignments for this course were ___________ to my learning.
The workload for this course in comparison to other courses was ___________.
The pace of this class was ____________ for optimal learning.
Field trips were well designed and ran smoothly.
I learned a lot from field trips.
How clearly does the instructor provide explanations of conceptual material?
How responsive to student comments was the instructor?
I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Apart from how well the course was taught, how valuable is the course to students with interests similar to yours?
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-14, if you wish
comments: I would recommend this course be offered to even to those students who get through with the communication assessment test.
Very good
this is a great course for a Non-native English speakers.

narratives.question_text: What were the best aspects of this course?
comments: practicum sessions and the short video clips we watched in class
Small group practicum and class room discussions.
Useful theory and wonderful opportunity to practice.
teaching many different aspects of communication skills, presentations, networking and etc.
Learn theory about communications skills
The combination of the lecture, practicum and type of exam is the best way to force the learning.
For me, the best aspects of this course is that you learn simple and effective techniques to improve your communication skills.

You get to know that communication skill is not only about being able to speak and write in English. There are many skills and knowledge that we learn through this course. the knowledge and skills gained in this course can be used in any field and throughout life.
The teacher
The practicum sessions were very valuable and helpful.

narratives.question_text: What aspects of this course need the most improvement?
comments: I think practicum time should be increased
None
More feedback. We submitted many assignments but received very little feedback.

The course is very valuable. I learn that the practice and the practicum is the most important part of the learning. I would suggest to have longer period before the practicum, for example if the class of Tuesday then the Practicum is on Monday the next week that allow students to practice more.

The one hour practicum is not enough to carry out and discuss about the assignments thoroughly. I think more time is needed. Furthermore, being the practicum a space for practicing and improving your communication skills, it is necessary for the instructor to correct its students when they make mistakes.
The course would be better if more time could be allotted to practical sessions.
The packet is a little hard to handle sometimes.
The practicum needs more time. An hour is rather short.
I believe each lecture can be shorter.

narratives.question_text: Was the relationship between the course lectures and discussion/lab section
comments: The course lectures and Thursday Practicum were very effective.
Yes. The practicums are helpful since we can practice what we have learnt in class and discuss with each other about how to improve.
As stated above, I consider giving more time to the practicum is important to complete all the exercises thoroughly.
the lectures and discussions are very effective. it could have been better if we had more time allotted for practical sessions.
Yes, they fit perfectly
It was very effective. Just need more time.

narratives.question_text: Discuss, if you wish, how this course fits into your overall program.  (Please feel free to describe how the course relates to your academic background.)
comments: After taking this course, I am able to effectively write and communicate my ideas.
Communication is a key concept in any field. So, I consider than improving your skills in this topic is very important for any professional, independently from what he or she is studying.
I aspire to be a future manager of environment and it is imperative that i have a good communication skills. Besides, coming from a non-english speaking country the course was relevant for me.
Very well, very important
Communication skill is always important no matter which field you will be engaging in. Thus, this course fits greatly into my overall program and career ahead of me.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: To better my communication and writing skills.
To improve my English communication skills.
to improve my communication skills, my presentations and my English in overall.
Because I need to improve my communication skills and had to take because if my low score in the communication test.
The foundation to improve my communication skills. I realized that I need to practice more, but I know which part to focus on.
I wanted to be a better communicator in English.
I was required, but even not, I would choose to take this course. It is the most important skill to have.
I was made to take the course

narratives.question_text: Did the knowledge/skills that you gained from the course meet your expectations ?
comments: Absolutely!
Well above my expectations
Yes.
Yes.
No
Yes, the knowledge I got from the course has exceeded my expectation. The course cover all aspect of professional communication settings on both oral and writing.
Yes.
Yes, in fact the course offered more than what i expected.
Yes, very much.
Yes. It did.
a little bit not satisfied. I feel there are some stuff we should go through in lecture, but we didnt. they are in the pdf.
I felt that I didn't learn a lot of new skills in the course

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: I got valuable feedback from class mates
The small group practicums were excellent way of putting course lectures into practice.
The practice sessions were quite helpful and interesting. Lis did a great job.
Advantages A good way of learning more ideas and knowledge i get to know more friends
The instructor could help us better and students could also help each other.
good, but not always effective and efficient.

narratives.question_text: For students who might consider taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Take this course if you want to improve on your communication skills. Do not confuse this course with English language. Even if your English is good, I recommend you take this course. Good communication is not the same as being able to speak English. Just take a look at the syllabus and you will see why I'm saying this.
If you do not have to take, do not take it.
Take the class if you consider you need to practice your english and acquire basic and effective communication skills.
Never miss the opportunity to learn more about English and communication.
Take advantage of it.
I encourage all the non-native English speakers to take it, and natives, too. It is MORE than English.
